15549.「村王に 用だったか？\n 残念だが 村王は このところ不在がちでな。\n また:
You wanted to see the Village King? I'm sorry,
but the Village King has been away a lot
lately. Will you come again later?

15550.「いや……。ちょっと待ってくれるか。: No... can you give me a minute?

15551.「じつは 村王が 不在がちなことについて\n 相談があるのだ……。:
In fact, I have something to discuss with you
regarding the absence of the Village King...

15552.「<pc>が 雪山から\n 村王を 救出してくれた日から\n どうも村王は 様子:
Ever since the day <pc> rescued the
Village King from the snowy mountains, he has
been acting strangely.

15553.「先日の儀式のように 子供たちに何かを教えたり\n 自分の役目を 人に引き継いだ:
Like the ritual the other day, teaching the children something, passing on his role to others, starting to organize his surroundings,
one after another...

15554.「最初は トシを気にされてのことかと\n 見守っていたが 最近は それも 少々\:
At first, I thought it was because he was concerned about his age, but recently, I have come to feel that he may be going a little too
far.

15555.「まるで……村王は この村を\n 出ていこうとでもしているのではないかと\n 思:
It's as if... the village king is trying to
leave this village...

15556.「思いすごしであれば よいのだが\n <pc>には 村王が 村を不在にして\n:
I hope this is just a passing thought, but
<pc> needs to find out what the
village king is doing outside the village.

15557.「それさえわかれば 私も 安心できる。\n もちろん 村王には 内密の上でだが\:
As long as I know that, I will be at ease. Of course, this would be done in secret from the Village King, but would you be willing to do
it?

15559.「そういうことなら まずは 村人たちから\n 目撃情報を集めるのが よいだろう。:
In that case, it would be a good idea to
gather sightings from the Villagers first. The
village king stands out wherever he is.

15561.「おおっ 恩に着るぞ……と言いたいところだが\n どうやら 今は 頼まれごとが\:
Oh, I'd say I owe you... but it looks like you
have a lot of favors to do right now...

15562.「無理強いはできんが\n できるなら 手を空けてきて\n 私の頼みを 聞いてほし:
I can't force you to do anything, but if you
could, I'd like you to go ahead and do me a
favor.

15563.「そ そうか……。\n では 気が変わったら また来てくれ。\n 取りかえしのつ:
Well then, if you change your mind, come back
again. Before something irreversible
happens...

15564.「おお <pc>。\n また来てくれたか。\n 私の頼みを 聞いてくれるのだな？:
Oh <pc>. There you are again. You'll
do me a favor, won't you?

15565.「<pc>が 雪山から\n 村王を 救出してくれた日から\n どうも村王は 様子:
Ever since the day <pc> rescued the
Village King from the snowy mountains, he has
been acting strangely.

15566.「次々に 身辺整理を始められ\n まるで……村王は この村から出ていこうとでも\:
One after the other, he began to put his
affairs in order, as if the village king might
be thinking of leaving this village.

15567.「<pc>には 村王が 何をしているのかを\n 調べてほしいのだ。もちろん 村王:
I want <pc> to find out what the
village king is doing. Of course, this must be
done in secret. Can you do it?

15568.「おお <pc>。\n 村王が 何をしているかは\n まだ調査中のようだな。:
Oh <pc>. Looks like you're still
investigating what the Village King is doing.

15569.「調査の基本は足だ！ とにかく 村人たちから\n 目撃情報を集めるのが よいだろ:
The key to any investigation is legwork! First
and foremost, you should ask the villagers
what they saw. It'd be hard to miss the chief.

15570.「私も ずいぶん トシをとりました。\n ……なにしろ あれから２０年です。:
I am very old now, too. Anyway, it's been 20
years since then.

15571.「あなたの血を引く息子が 極限まで\n きたえあげて…… わしを 殺しにきます。:
Your blood son will be trained to the utmost
limits and he will come to kill me. I'm sure
he will be stronger than you can imagine.

15572.「わしは 逃げも隠れもしません。\n 今 持っている すべてのチカラで\n ただ:
I will neither run nor hide. I will only
accept it with all the strength I have at my
disposal...

15573.「おお <pc>……か？\n こんな所で いったい何を……:
Oh, <pc>? What the hell are you doing
here?

15574.「……なるほど。\n おおかた ギュランのやつが探させたのだろう。\n まったく:
I see. Guran must have sent him looking for
it. He's a worrier, isn't he?

15575.「ギュランは 子供の頃から 身体が弱かった。\n だが 生来の負けず嫌いでな。\:
Guran was physically weak since childhood. But
he hated to lose. Because of his weakness, he
studied hard.

15576.「そのかいあって 今では オーガの中では\n 飛び抜けて アタマがいい。わしは:
He's one of the smartest Ogres I've ever met,
and I like that about him. I like him so much
that I made him my close associate.

15577.「しかし…… ギュランに\n 心配をかけたのは 無理もなかったか……。:
But... it was understandable that Guran was
worried...

15578.「<pc>よ。この墓はな わしが若い頃\n 互いに切磋琢磨した 兄貴分の墓なのだ:
<pc>. This tomb is that of my
brother, with whom I had friendly competition
when we were young.

15579.「名を ガガベスといった。\n わしなどよりも はるかに強く 史上最強の\n チ:
His name was Gagabes. He was a hero of the
village, much stronger than me, and was called
the strongest champion in history.

15580.「わしは 何度 挑んでも\n まったく ガガベスに 歯が立たなかった。\n だが:
No matter how many times I challenged him, I
was never a match for Gagabes. But one day, in
a match...

15581.「わしの拳が 吸い込まれるように\n ガガベスの みぞおちに入ってしまった……。:
My fist went into Gagabes' gut like it was
being sucked in...

15582.「それは ただの幸運な一撃に過ぎなかった。\n だが ガガベスは その一撃によっ:
It was only a stroke of luck. But Gagabes left
this world on the battlefield with that blow.

15583.「あまりのことに わしは唖然としていたが\n 新たなチャンピオンの誕生に\n 村:
I was stunned by this, but the birth of a new
champion had the people of the village
excited.

15584.「当時のランガーオ村は なによりも\n 勝つことこそが 尊ばれた時代だったのだ。:
In those days, winning was the most important
thing in Langao Village.

15585.「そして 敗者には 残酷な仕打ちが与えられた。\n 英雄だったガガベスの地位は\:
And the losers were dealt a cruel blow. The
heroic status of Gagabes was instantly
destroyed by death.

15586.「ガガベスには 奥さんと 息子がいたが\n それ以来 弱き者の家族として しいた:
Gagabes had a wife and a son, but ever since
then they have been treated as a family of the
weak and forced to live a very poor life...

15587.「苦労がたたってか 奥さんは 数年後になくなり\n 息子が ひとり残された。:
After a few years of hard work, his wife
passed away and all that was left was his son.

15588.「その息子の名は ガガイ……。\n 当時 まだ６才だったガガイは\n ある日 わ:
His son's name was Gagai... Gagai, who was
only six years old at the time, came to me one
day and said this.

15589.「いつか 必ず お前を殺す。\n そのために どんなことでもする……とな。:
One day, I will surely kill you. And I'll do
whatever it takes to make that happen.

15590.「……今から ２０年前のことだ。\n ガガイは そのまま村を出ていき ずっと\n:
...20 years ago. Gagai left the village as it
was, and we didn't even know if he was still
alive all these years.

15591.「そして お前に助けてもらった あの日……\n そのガガイから 手紙が来たのだ。:
And the day you saved my life I received a
letter from that Gagai.

15592.「手紙には ただ一言 こう書いてあった。\n お前を 殺しにいく……とな。:
In the letter, he wrote only one sentence. I'm
going to kill you.

15593.「わしは老いたが 逃げも隠れもせん。\n むしろ こちらから ガガイの所に\n:
I am old, but I will neither run nor hide. I
would rather go to Gagai myself.

15594.「勝つことは 難しいだろう……。\n だが わしは 持てるチカラの すべてをかけ:
It will be difficult to win, but I will have
to put everything I have into the fight
against him.

15595.「いらぬ心配は かけたくない。\n このことは ギュランや 村の連中には\n ど:
I don't want you to worry. Please do not
mention this to Guran and the others in the
village.

15597.「すっかり 長話になってしまったな。\n さあ 村へ帰ろう。:
It's been a long story. Let's go back to the
village.

15598.「ギュランには わしの方から\n うまいこと言っておく。とにかく\n ここでのこ:
I'll tell Guran what to do. Anyway, please
keep quiet about what's going on here.

15599.「これは わしとお前の 約束だ。\n よいな？ ガハハハ！:
This is a promise between you and me.
Okay? Gahahaha!
